title: Which is that font...
content:
Is that of the Smart graphic advert? Please I need to know!  
Thank you!!!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [anuncio.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081019125221/http:/typophile.com/files/anuncio.jpg) | 137.11 KB |

 [‹ ID help please](http://web.archive.org/web/20081019125221/http:/typophile.com/node/50644 "Go to previous forum topic") [Certificate Type ID please ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081019125221/http:/typophile.com/node/50648 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Saratyp

comments.content:
Looks to me like it might be FF Elementa  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff\_elementa/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081019125221/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_elementa/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff\_elementa/")

oops. sorry.  
No it’s not Elementa. Elementa is rounded and your sample does not show a rounded typeface.
